title: The Safety Trap - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/12/21
itunes:title: The Safety Trap - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/12/21
description:
George Noory and threat management expert Spencer Coursen explore his theories on protecting ourselves and our families, and how feeling safe actually lowers our defenses and makes us less likely to be able to defend ourselves.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
